Changelog
=========

-----

2.0.0
-----
 - upgraded to Pyramid 2.0

-----

 - updated setup

1.2.2

1.2.1

1.2.0

1.1.0

1.0.1

 - removed Travis-CI configuration

1.0.0
-----
 - initial release
